statements: SELECT * FROM Course_Registration
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_status FROM Course_Registration
SELECT course_name, student_name, registration_date FROM Course_Registration
SELECT * FROM Course_Registration WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Course_Registration ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Course_Registration WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM Course_Registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Course_Registration GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM Course_Registration WHERE student_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005);
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM Course_Registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_schedule FROM students s, courses c WHERE s.course_id = c.course_id AND s.student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.course_instructor = 'Professor Smith' ORDER BY s.student_name;
SELECT student_id, student_name, c.course_name, course_schedule FROM students s LEFT JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_capacity > 20;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, message, communication_date FROM Students JOIN Communications ON Students.student_id = Communications.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, message, communication_date FROM students JOIN communication ON students.student_id = communication.student_id WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, message, communication_date FROM students JOIN communication ON students.student_id = communication.student_id WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
